edge: Suraj Singh meets Savitri, who welcomes and accepts him. This leads Suraj to wonder as to what prompted Savitri to point a finger at Yograj.
Savitri recognizes Thakur as a wanted criminal, Yograj, but Thakur denies being Yograj nor having any connection with him.
Through his investigation, Suraj comes to know that his biological father is Yograj.
